conclusion: Analyze current positions of shadows and influence of light source's position
Shadow A is cast by the cake
Shadow B is cast by the soccer ball
Shadow C is cast by the roll of toilet paper
Shadow D is cast by the envelope
Light source moving to the right changes angle of light, causing shadows to shift and potentially change in size
Shadow A will move to the left, cast more towards the left side of the cake
Shadow B will move to the left, cast more towards the left side of the soccer ball
Shadow C will move to the left, cast more towards the left side of the toilet paper roll
Shadow D will move to the left, cast more towards the left side of the envelope
Shadows will become longer due to more oblique angle of light hitting the objects
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D will move to the left and become longer
